# Discover Curated Souvenirs at Haneda Airport

Haneda Airport is a prime shopping destination, gathering renowned specialties from across Japan. Utilize your final moments before departure or return to discover the perfect souvenirs for your loved ones. You'll find exclusive airport-only items and a rich selection of traditional Japanese goods. Take a moment before your flight to indulge in some special souvenir shopping.

## Japanese Tea Specialty Store

<Place id="ChIJT3n8Po5hGGARDKTSXu7ejZw" />

Nihoncha Kimikura, nestled in Haneda Airport Garden, is a specialty store showcasing carefully selected Japanese teas. Beyond the tea leaves themselves, you'll discover a rich array of Japanese sweets and elegant tea accessories. Choose from a diverse selection including Matcha, Sencha, and Hojicha. Here, you're sure to find exquisite souvenirs that beautifully convey Japan's traditional tea culture to your cherished recipients.

## Established Wagashi Shop from Kawagoe

<Place id="ChIJY0R9UnhhGGARn3c__Cw4k9c" />

Discover Kurazukuri Honpo in Haneda Airport Garden, specializing in celebrated confections from 'Little Edo' Kawagoe. Their wagashi, crafted using traditional methods, enchant with their stunning beauty and refined flavors. The selection ranges from famous sweets that echo Kawagoe's rich history to delightful seasonal limited editions. This is a precious find, allowing you to effortlessly purchase authentic Japanese wagashi right at the airport.

## Honey Specialty Store

<Place id="ChIJU5QtQlFhGGARqbI5v2QFSL4" />

Visit Sugi Bee Garden, found within Haneda Airport Garden. This store boasts an abundant selection of honey-based products, with a special emphasis on exquisite domestic honey. Their diverse lineup features pure honey, delectable honey-pickled dried fruits, and even honey-infused cosmetics. These make perfect souvenirs for health-conscious individuals. Here, you can discover premium quality products that beautifully represent Japan's rich beekeeping culture.

## Discover Special Souvenirs at Haneda Airport

Take a moment before your flight to discover that truly special gift for your loved ones.
